scripts.mock: npm run clean && coho createcollection --collection 'listings' && coho import -f bin/testdata-listings.json -c listings
scripts.setup: npm run clean && coho createcollection --collection 'listings' && coho import -f build/output.json -c listings
scripts.buildindex: coho query listings > build/database-listings.json && node bin/buildindex.js
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run buildindex
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run bundle && codehooks deploy -d && codehooks logs --follow
